item.title: 1.0.1030 - New troop carriers and redesign of the colony screen
item.description:
This update actually started a few days ago with the updated colony screen and two new upgrades for the troop carrier: missionary and emissary. The former allows you to take over a native colony using troop carriers only, rather than destroying the colony and then re-colonizing. The latter allows you to perform "propaganda" on an enemy colony and take it over (after a few minutes delay).

Today's update features some QOL improvements to the new design that people over on discord have been begging for. Be sure to join us over there to have your own say!

The other big change to today's build is I've re-added support for push notifications! This was broken a long time ago when Google changed the API I had to call and I never got around to fixing it. If you prefer a notification-free experience, you can turn notifications off in the options.

This update adds a new setting to the "Options" screen. Under "Game options" you can choose the default focus you want any new colonies to have. The default is still 25% on all four, but you could configure it to be 50/50 between population and food or whatever you like.

Also fixed some layouts on smaller devices (let me know if you spot any more!).

As always, your feedback is most welcome, you can join us on Discord or help to fund the game by supporting me on Patreon.

item.title: Server migration
item.description:
I'll be migrating to a larger server later tonight, so expect ~1 hour of downtime. I'll be posting updates on the status over on Discord, so join there if you want to stay updated.

Update: New server is up & running, please let me know on Discord if you run into any issues.

There's not a lot of changes in build 1008, but I've added the first version of a check that will stop the game from running on emulators such as BlueStacks. I'll be expanding this check in the future, but the game is meant to be run on real devices, so that it's fair for everybody.

I also fixed a glitch which erroneously allowed multiple Biospheres to be build on a planet.

As always, your feedback is most welcome, you can join us on Discord or help to fund the game by supporting me on Patreon.

This version has a long-awaited fix for wormholes: you can now use them more than once without it deadlocking and not working again...

Also some minor fixes to better handle being rate-limited, more robust handling of the initial connection and a few other minor fixes.

As always, your feedback is most welcome, you can join us on Discord or help to fund the game by supporting me on Patreon.

item.title: 1.0.1002 Blocking empires in chat
item.description:
Due to popular demand, the "penalty box" has been removed from global chat, instead replaced with the ability to individual block empires that you don't want to hear from any more.

As always, please join us in discord if you want to discuss the update, and of course if you want to keep up to date on the progress of War Worlds 2, then join my Patreon!

item.title: 1.0 and the server's back
item.description:
OK, a couple of announcements here.

First, we have a brand new server, with a fresh restart of the universe. We're calling this the "Default" realm, because I've incremented the version number 1.0(!!)

Honestly, there's not a lot of changes between 0.9.906 and 1.0.1000 except for this server reset. Oh, and your starting cash when you create a new empire has been bumped to $250k (for a limited time, while people get back up to speed).

The old server had been run by a dedicated fan, but it looks like their subscription expired. I'm currently working to see if I can get a backup of the old universe. If I do, then I'll restore the "Beta" realm in all it's past glory.

If you want to stay in touch, please join us on Discord. And of course, to help fund the game into the future, please consider supporting me on Patreon.

item.title: 0.9.906 - Greenhouses
item.description: This update sees the addition of a new greenhouse building! If you build a greenhouse on a planet, it will increase the farming statistic of the planet, a bit more for each level of the building. Turn the most inhosptiable planet into a workable farm!
